data.message: You people are really stupid lol. Drake bows to any rapper in their hometown and there was never really any beef it was all media created. Drake and Em have respect for each other.

replies.message: Lol don't tell them man just let them continue to be clueless.. I love how "Drake vs Eminem" in a rap battle was all over the place lmao these guys don't rap battle they've got much better things to do like preform at sold out shows, work on new shit, and spend time with family and friends
Damn, at least I share the same knowledge with someone 👍
Yea but bowing down to another man come on!! GTFOH

Em will battle rap anytime, anywhere with anyone. It's his passion
Drake would shit himself standing on the other side of him haha
You know you're lame when you capitalize random shit. Are you yelling? Is it like a loud whisper?
There just hate so much on drake..They living the past..If anything y'all should be thanking drake for Bringing Out Em
You're so right Mr.Black. Forgot what they show for each other and what has been said about them respecting each other means nothing. You are the one who decides. 😂
